name: INF-HSEQ CC0375-ITP-012 Concrete Pavement Construction & Checklist - Rev.3

name: Acceptance criteria - Lots to be broken up accordingly and outlined on a lot map
Remarks / record (eg. test frequency, reports, certificates, checklist etc) -
Acceptance criteria - Mix design to be approved prior to placement.
– Minimum Concrete strength 32 MPa or as specified in Drawings
Remarks / record (eg. test frequency, reports, certificates, checklist etc) -
Acceptance criteria - Extents and levels correct to relevant drawings
Remarks / record (eg. test frequency, reports, certificates, checklist etc) -
Acceptance criteria - Loose material to be removed from the surface prior to pouring.
○ Waterproof membrane installed on subgrade prior to placement of lean-mix concrete.
○ Notice: 1 working day prior to covering
Acceptance criteria - Correct size electrical conduit as per drawings, to be installed before blinding layer
2.4 - Formwork set out and positioning correct
Acceptance criteria - Ensure drawings have been checked and the set out is correct
○ Notice: 1 working day prior to covering
Acceptance criteria - Steel reinforcement to be placed as per design drawings with the correct amount of cover.
○ Notice: 2 working days prior to covering
Remarks / record (eg. test frequency, reports, certificates, checklist etc) -
Ref docs - Spec. 0319 Minor Concrete Works [Cl 4.8, 4.9, 4.10, 4.11] Drawings
Acceptance criteria - As per drawings concrete strength of cast in-situ units shall be min. Grade N32 or otherwise stated on drawings.
○ Placing of concrete ambient shade temperatures:
– Concrete: Maintain the temperature of the freshly mixed concrete at ≥ 5°C
– Formwork and reinforcements: Before and during placing maintain temperature at ≥ 5°C
Normal concrete in footings, beams, columns, walls and slabs || 35°C
Concrete in sections ≥ 1 m in all dimensions except for concrete of strength 40 MPa or greater, in sections exceeding 600 mm in thickness || 27°C
○ Concrete placed in layers ≤ 300mm thick and adequately vibrated avoiding over-vibration.
○ Slump shall not exceed 75mm unless shown otherwise on the drawings.
Remarks / record (eg. test frequency, reports, certificates, checklist etc) -
Acceptance criteria - Concrete surfaces shall be true and even, free from honeycombed surface depressions or rejections.
Acceptance criteria - As per design drawings. Sawn joints to commence as soon as the concrete has hardened sufficiently.
Ref docs - Spec. 0319 Minor Concrete Works [Cl 4.13]
Acceptance criteria - From completion of finishing cure continuously with an approved method for a min period of 7 days or as directed by the Superintendent.
Acceptance criteria - Average strength of all samples must exceed required value.
○ Strength of any one sample must be 0.85 the required value.
Remarks / record (eg. test frequency, reports, certificates, checklist etc) -
Acceptance criteria - An as-built survey completed to ensure all structures are within construction tolerances.
